personal.name: Sahil Gupta
personal.title: Lead Engineer | Software Generalist
personal.bio: Senior Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience architecting and building scalable, secure enterprise platforms. Specializing in distributed systems, cloud-native infrastructure, microservices architecture, and full-stack development. Passionate about creating innovative solutions that drive business transformation and deliver exceptional user experiences.
personal.tagline: Building the future of AI-powered applications

about.description: I'm a Lead Software Engineer with 5+ years of experience building scalable, secure, and AI-driven enterprise platforms across SaaS, cloud-native, and distributed systems. My expertise spans Agentic AI, multi-agent architectures, backend and microservices development, and Kubernetes-based infrastructure. I specialize in designing secure authentication and authorization systems (SSO, OAuth, IdP/SP), building high-performance data pipelines, and developing robust third-party integrations. I'm passionate about forward-deployed engineering, collaborating directly with global customers to drive onboarding, data integrations, security integrations, and production adoption of innovative AI solutions.
highlights: Pioneered agentic AI features by integrating LLM-based intelligent agents into workflows, automating repetitive tasks and improving customer productivity
Built Model Context Protocol (MCP) server and designed multi-agent systems for complex workflow automation with intelligent task delegation
Architected secure authentication services implementing SP & IdP-based SSO, Keycloak integration for multi-tenant SaaS deployments
Designed and optimized data integrations across 25+ enterprise SaaS platforms, reducing sync latency by 30%
Engineered scalable Kubernetes-based systems achieving 40% cost efficiency improvements through intelligent workload management
Led and managed cross-functional team of 10+ engineers, providing technical mentorship and overseeing project delivery
Built privacy-compliant analytics service with cookieless tracking, enabling real-time user behavior monitoring across customer websites
Holds M.Tech in Cloud Computing from BITS Pilani and Post Graduation in GenAI & Agentic AI from IIT Roorkee, complementing 5+ years of hands-on engineering experience

workExperience.subtitle: 5+ years of professional experience building scalable software solutions, leading engineering teams, and architecting AI-powered systems across various domains.

work.description: Led the design and implementation of agentic and multi-agent AI systems integrated into enterprise workflows, building scalable backend infrastructure, data integrations, third-party integrations, MCP tooling, secure auth systems, and Kubernetes-based data pipelines to drive AI-powered automation and platform scalability.
achievements: Pioneered agentic AI features by integrating LLM-based intelligent agents into workflows, automating repetitive tasks and improving customer productivity through AI-driven automation and intelligent decision-making.

Built a Model Context Protocol (MCP) server to expose in-house APIs and processes as tools for internal and external agents, enabling sophisticated Multi-Agent systems with seamless agent-to-agent communication and workflow orchestration.

Designed and developed multi-agent systems leveraging distributed AI agents for complex workflow automation, enabling intelligent task delegation, parallel processing, and collaborative problem-solving across enterprise workflows.

Architected and developed secure authentication and authorization services implementing SP & IdP-based SSO, Keycloak integration, and API token-based access control, strengthening platform security and compliance for multi-tenant SaaS deployments.

Built a cookieless and cookie-based dynamic site analytics service to track user behavior and engagement across customer websites, providing privacy-compliant visitor tracking and real-time analytics capabilities.
Designed and optimized data integrations across 25+ enterprise SaaS platforms including CRM, marketing automation, and analytics tools, improving data accuracy and reducing sync latency by 30%.

Engineered a scalable data extraction worker system on Kubernetes to pull data from external sources, implementing auto-scaling, fault tolerance, and resource optimization to ensure robust data ingestion with 40% cost efficiency improvements through intelligent workload management.

Architected and enhanced critical infrastructure components including API gateways, Kubernetes ingress controllers, and load balancers, improving system reliability, traffic management, and scalability for high-availability enterprise deployments.

work.description: Built high-performance backend and embedded systems enabling real-time AI monitoring, implemented IPC and API integrations, optimized memory-constrained applications, and led a 10+ member team delivering scalable, production-grade systems.
achievements: Designed and implemented Inter-Process Communication (IPC) mechanisms and RESTful APIs to enable seamless integration of multiple AI services into the core product's backend, enhancing system modularity and scalability.
Diagnosed and resolved critical memory leaks and change detection issues in the frontend application, optimizing UI performance by 20% and significantly improving user experience.
Engineered a lightweight, high-performance application optimized for embedded systems with minimal memory footprint, achieving smooth UX even on resource-constrained hardware environments.

Led and managed a cross-functional team of 10+ engineers and interns, providing technical mentorship, conducting code reviews, and overseeing project delivery while ensuring adherence to best practices and development standards.
Collaborated with AI/ML teams to architect backend infrastructure supporting real-time monitoring and analytics capabilities, ensuring robust data processing and system reliability.

work.description: Developed enterprise microservices and APIs, including e-signature integration and a configurable Revenue Operations platform, delivering scalable backend systems, dashboards, and integrations for compliance-driven and operational workflows.
achievements: Developed a microservice to integrate external document signing capabilities (e-signature) into an existing Quality Management System (QMS), implementing mailing services and user portals to streamline document workflows and enhance compliance processes.

Conceptualized and implemented a scalable and configurable Revenue Operations (RevOps) platform from the ground up, building notification systems, interactive dashboards, and dynamic configuration modules to improve operational efficiency and user experience.
Designed RESTful APIs and backend services to enable seamless integration between third-party services and internal systems, ensuring high availability and performance for enterprise clients.

work.description: Contributed to a cloud-native security and cyber-safety platform using Spring Boot, React, and GCP, building scalable security features, monitoring, and compliance capabilities for distributed enterprise cloud environments.
achievements: Developed a cloud-based Data Security and Cyber Safety platform using Java Spring Boot, React, and GCP, implementing multiple features through GCP APIs to enable advanced security measures and compliance controls for enterprise teams working on cloud platforms.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to enhance workspace security by building scalable security monitoring, data protection features, and real-time vulnerability detection capabilities for distributed cloud environments.
Promoted from Intern Developer to Software Engineer after completing the internship project within 3 months of joining the company.

projects.name: Intelligent Voice Agent with Avatar
projects.description: Full-stack AI voice agent with synchronized visual avatar for natural conversation and appointment-style booking workflows.
projects.longDescription: Implemented a web-based voice assistant that combines real-time speech recognition, LLM-powered reasoning, and a synchronized visual avatar. The system supports natural multi-turn conversations, scheduling-style flows (such as booking and managing time slots), real-time transcription, and conversation summarization. The backend is built with Python using LiveKit Agents and FastAPI, integrating Deepgram for STT, Cartesia for TTS, Anthropic Claude for LLM reasoning, Tavus for avatar streaming, and Supabase for persistence. The frontend is a React + TypeScript app using Vite, LiveKit Components, and WebRTC to deliver low-latency, bi-directional audio/video and transcripts in the browser.
highlights: End-to-end voice assistant with synchronized avatar, real-time transcription, and conversation summaries
Tool-calling agent that can identify users, fetch slots, book, modify, retrieve, and cancel appointments
LiveKit-based architecture that streams low-latency audio/video between browser and backend agent
Containerized deployment using Docker Compose for backend, frontend, and supporting services

projects.name: Agentic Loan Lifecycle Intelligence Platform
projects.description: Multi-agent AI platform for intelligent loan lifecycle management, customer nudging, and cross-department coordination in banking.
projects.longDescription: Designing an agentic, multi-agent system to manage and optimize the end-to-end loan lifecycle in a banking domain, from lead generation to disbursement and post-loan engagement. The platform uses LLM-powered agents to sense loan status, reason over rules and policies, trigger contextual nudges, and collaborate across departments such as sales, underwriting, verification, and operations. Built using a FastAPI backend with LangChain/LangGraph-based agent orchestration, MCP for agent-to-tool communication, vector databases and memory layers for context retention, and integrations with external tools such as email, messaging, and voice systems. The system operates on synthetic data and mock APIs to simulate real-world banking workflows, decision points, and escalations.
highlights: Multi-agent orchestration to manage loan stages from lead generation to disbursement
LLM-driven reasoning to detect stalled loans and trigger rule-based and contextual nudges
Cross-department collaboration between sales, underwriting, verification, and operations via agents
Learning and escalation mechanisms where repeated failed nudges trigger human or higher-authority intervention

projects.name: Contextual News Retrieval & Trending Intelligence System
projects.description: LLM-powered backend system for contextual news retrieval, ranking, and location-aware trending insights.
projects.longDescription: Designing and implementing a contextual news data retrieval platform that leverages LLMs to understand user intent, extract entities, and dynamically select optimal data retrieval strategies. The system ingests structured news data into a database, simulates multiple API behaviors (category, source, search, score, nearby), and enriches results with LLM-generated summaries. Additionally, implementing a location-based trending news feed by simulating user interaction events, computing trending scores using engagement volume, recency, and geographical relevance, and optimizing performance using location-aware caching strategies.
highlights: LLM-driven entity extraction and intent classification for contextual news queries
Simulated multi-endpoint news retrieval including category, source, search, score, and nearby queries
Advanced ranking logic combining relevance scores, recency, text similarity, and geospatial distance
Location-based trending news feed using simulated user engagement streams and geospatial caching

projects.name: Voice Agent Platform for Logistics
projects.description: AI-powered voice agent platform for automating driver check-ins and handling emergency situations in logistics operations.
projects.longDescription: Built an advanced AI voice agent system using React, TypeScript, FastAPI, and Retell AI to automate logistics dispatch operations. Implemented adaptive multi-turn conversation flows, real-time voice processing, and intelligent emergency detection. Integrated LLM-based natural language understanding using Anthropic APIs and persistent storage using Supabase, enabling real-time monitoring and structured data extraction from live voice calls.
highlights: Adaptive multi-turn conversation flows for complex logistics scenarios
Real-time voice AI processing and structured conversation extraction
Intelligent emergency situation detection and automated escalation
Designed for easy integration with existing logistics management systems

projects.name: Social Media Content Moderator
projects.description: AI-assisted content moderation system for automated classification and filtering of social media content.
projects.longDescription: Developed a modular content moderation pipeline using pretrained and fine-tuned language models to classify social media text into moderation categories (e.g., toxic, abusive, safe). The system includes demonstration notebooks for experimentation with different model backends (OpenAI, Hugging Face) and data preprocessing. Integrated multi-stage classification logic, threshold-based filtering, and explainability insights from model outputs to support human review workflows. Aimed to provide a reusable framework for building scalable moderation systems that can handle large volumes of unstructured social media text.
highlights: Notebook workflows for fine-tuning and evaluating moderation models
Multi-backend support for OpenAI and Hugging Face model experimentation
Automated text classification into moderation categories
Framework designed for scalable and human-in-the-loop moderation

projects.name: Hotel Booking Microservices Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-style hotel management system built using a distributed microservices architecture.
projects.longDescription: Developed a full-scale hotel booking and management platform using Spring Boot microservices, API Gateway, and RabbitMQ for asynchronous communication. Implemented service discovery using Eureka and designed scalable REST APIs backed by MySQL. Containerized services using Docker and deployed them using Kubernetes to enable local distributed system simulation and production-style deployments.
highlights: Microservices-based architecture with asynchronous messaging
API Gateway and service discovery for scalable request routing
Dockerized services with Kubernetes-based orchestration
Enterprise-style backend design simulating real-world distributed systems

projects.name: Risk-Based Data Policy Management System
projects.description: Automated system for detecting and reporting policy-based risks in enterprise user files.
projects.longDescription: Designed and developed a risk-based data policy management web application using Spring Boot microservices, Redis, and MySQL. Implemented policy evaluation engines to automatically detect compliance risks in user files and generate real-time reports. Reduced manual compliance assessment time by introducing automated policy checks and real-time alerting mechanisms.
highlights: Automated detection of policy-based data security risks
Real-time compliance reporting and alerting
Significant reduction in manual compliance assessment effort
Designed for enterprise-scale data security workflows

projects.name: Drowsiness Detection System
projects.description: Real-time driver drowsiness detection system using computer vision and deep learning.
projects.longDescription: Built a real-time drowsiness detection application using machine learning and deep learning techniques with computer vision. Implemented facial and eye movement tracking to detect driver fatigue and trigger alerts. Optimized the system to perform reliably in low-light conditions while maintaining high accuracy and real-time performance.
highlights: Real-time detection of driver drowsiness using vision-based models
Facial and eye movement tracking for fatigue analysis
High accuracy with reliable performance in low-light environments
Designed to improve road safety through timely alerts
